thread.title: Colourful RWC

author: news24.com
title: Colourful RWC
text:
The squad has been selected, the 31players entrusted with winning the World Cup are known to all, they have received their kit, their passports are stamped and they are just awaiting their tickets…no point in arguing anymore.
Whether you agree or disagree with the selections that have been made..well it is all for naught, you could either choose to remain negative, or you could rather choose to support the Springboks and hope for the best.
Facts.
But, what would happen should one of the select few pick up an injury, how will that player be replaced? Will Heyneke Meyer still have to maintain a 30% representative margin even if he is forced to send for a player after the World Cup has started?
I do not wish injury on any player in the 31 strong squad, but I do wonder…should someone like Rudy Paige for example get injured…either on the field or stepping of the team bus…ala Johan Goosen…what then?
Will Meyer be allowed to send for Cobus Reinach, or will he be obligated to swop colour for colour?
